features: Whole-body moisturizing lotion: Take skin care further with our daily lotion designed to gently exfoliate and deeply hydrate your face, hands and body, revealing rejuvenated skin all around in just one step

Our award-winning formula: Daily Nourish 12% uses a therapeutic formula that immediately moisturizes and restores skin radiance while 12% lactic acid, a gentle yet effective AHA, exfoliates dead skin cells and promotes skin cell turnover

Simplify your skincare routine: Our all-in-one lotion is an exfoliator and moisturizer, meaning you can finally reduce the number of skin care products on your shelf while still showing your skin the love it deserves
The deepest care for your skin: Our paraben-free, lightweight, non-greasy formula is made without fragrance so you can safely maintain soft, smooth skin with confidence; ideal for rough, dry skin
AmLactin is the #1 dermatologist-recommended moisturizer brand with lactic acid; our therapeutic formula works with your skin to boost its natural renewal process through gentle exfoliation
body.description: Instantly hydrate and help relieve rough skin with AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion. Formulated with 12 percent lactic acid, this daily moisturizer lotion boosts your skin’s natural renewal process. A non-greasy moisturizing lotion, AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion for dry skin is also fragrance-free and paraben-free. It deeply moisturizes rough, dry skin, leaving it soft and smooth. AmLactin hydrating moisturizer helps relieve symptoms of skin conditions such as keratosis pilaris and dry skin and comes in a convenient pump bottle for easy application! Help hydrate plus smooth skin with AmLactin moisturizers and dry skin lotion, from the Number 1 Dermatologist Recommended Moisturizer Brand with Lactic Acid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From a Person who Hates Lotion
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loathe lotions. I hate applying them. I hate the greasy residue. I hate the overly perfumed mess that causes me migraines. I would rather deal with skin so dry that wearing clothes or the sheets on my skin is painful (if you know what I mean, you *know* what I mean). I also deal with acne, psoriasis, contact eczema, and KP (to list a few). So, I had avoided any lotions for 41 years until someone in one of my FB groups who deals with the same issues I do (hEDS/JHS/HSD) turned me on to this stuff. It's absolutely amazing...now that doesn't mean I like applying it as someone who's lived 40 odd years without a lotion habit, but it does mean that I do use it daily (or at least every other day depending on my shower schedule). I even moved to a cold high desert and I have better skin than I ever did in a warmer humid climate because I'm actually using this lotion regularly. So here are the reasons I like it: 1) if not applied too heavily (one squirt per leg is enough), this stuff sinks in within minutes. I can put some on my hands and use my phone two minutes later or handle food or do anything else without feeling like I'm covered in oil (ugh hate that feeling). 2) I no longer have painful sheets/clothes problems because I'm actually using this stuff (see #1). 3) there's no perfume or scent that will give me migraines. It doesn't smell the best upon application (some people say it has a bit of an ammonia scent, but that's gone in seconds), but that doesn't bother me. 4) I can use this without breaking out. 5) when I do slip and stop using it and my skin starts hurting with any contact, this lotion also provides negative reinforcement because it stings (no seriously, this stuff stings on open wounds or really dry skin) which helps remind me that I *can't* go days without using lotion or bad things start happening. Anyway, if any of the above resonates with you, give this stuff a try. It's truly a game-changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product softens skin
reviews.reviewText: Yes, it smells a bit like sour milk going on but the odor goes away quickly. It dramatically softens skin within two weeks. I may have used too frequently on the face causing some irritation on the cheeks. But great for legs, arms, torso. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helps Dry Skin
reviews.reviewText: It works well but it has an off putting odor that goes away after about 15-20 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use this on repeat!
reviews.reviewText: I use this lotion for my hands and feet and sometimes the backs of my arms and elbows. I like the lactic acid in the product. It does a lot to soften and gently exfoliate dull, dry and rough skin. For my feet, I like to put it on before bed and then wear cotton socks to bed, the next day my feet are so soft. With regular use, the last time I got a pedicure, the nail technician told me the bottom of my feet had hardly any dead skin. I do think it is the best lotion I have ever used for my hands and feet. I have repurchased this a couple of times and will continue to purchase this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for cracking wrinkles dry skinIt does smell for a minute but it works well so to me the small smell is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My dermatologist recommended this lotion as an alternative to a retinol body lotion. The lotion application is lovely ... not too thick and not too thin ... and it does feel moisturizing; however, the smell of this lotion, even though it is unscented, is extremely unpleasant to me. Some people say it smells like cat urine; others say it has a heavy smell of maple syrup. I cannot pinpoint the smell. It is strong and horrible. This is not a lotion I will apply before going out in public. I will continue to use it until gone but I will not purchase this lotion again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Once you get past the smell …
reviews.reviewText: … this lotion is amazing.Not gonna lie, this is by far the worst smelling lotion I’ve ever used. So bad I almost returned it.Then I noticed my skin stayed hydrated for 3-4 days, way longer than my prior go to lotion.So I set out to see if I could manage my way around the smell, and feel I cracked the code.I start by using equal amounts of Amlactin and a pleasant smelling lotion (Maja). After application, I choose a fragrance from my collection that isn’t too strong and not very long lasting (Tabac and Mac Turquatic work great) then spray liberally everywhere I applied lotion.By the time the cologne fades, so does the bad smell of the lotion.A little creativity and I’m loving this lotion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the feel of this lotion and it seems very helpful as I have super dry skin. It goes on nicely and doesn't sit on top of my skin but seems to melt in. This was recommended by a skin care doctor. I do have sensitive skin and this lotion has not affected me in any negative way.

reviews.reviewTitle: Silky Smooth Skin with Sandoz Amlactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Sandoz Amlactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion for a while now, and I must say it has been a game-changer for my skin.This lotion lives up to its promise of providing daily moisturization. It's incredibly hydrating, and I noticed a significant improvement in the texture of my skin. It's especially effective for dry and rough patches.One of the standout features of this lotion is its exfoliating properties. The inclusion of lactic acid helps to gently slough off dead skin cells, leaving my skin feeling smoother and more radiant. However, if you have sensitive skin, it's important to be cautious and perhaps do a patch test before using it on a larger area, as lactic acid can be a bit strong for some.The lotion absorbs well into the skin, and it doesn't leave a greasy residue. I can apply it in the morning and not worry about feeling sticky throughout the day.While the lotion is effective, I wish it had a more pleasant scent. It has a somewhat medicinal odor that might not be to everyone's liking. However, the scent dissipates fairly quickly, so it's not a deal-breaker for me.Sandoz Amlactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion is a fantastic choice for anyone seeking intense hydration and the added bonus of exfoliation. It has done wonders for my skin's texture, making it feel soft and smooth. The only minor downside is the fragrance, but the results definitely outweigh that. I highly recommend it to those in need of an effective daily moisturizing lotion.

I have kp and i only use this moisturizer it has reduced so much roughness on my skin.The only downfall is that this purchase i made is only 225 g not really worth the price. I once got the 500g for the same price as this. Ill get it when its on sale cos its not worth the price for such a small bottle But the moisturizer itself is fantastic. If money no issue get it you will love the different it will make on your skin.

Amlactin is mysteriously harder to buy and usually more expensive on Amazon Canada. Given that, I’m very pleased with the price point of this two pack I received. Shipping and delivery was quicker than expected and I’ll be buying again once I run out.

reviews.reviewTitle: ¡ME QUITÓ LOS GRANOS DE LOS BRAZOS!
reviews.reviewText: Yo llevaba años con granitos en los brazos, me causaba mucha inseguridad porque se sentían mucho. Investigue hace años y me salían este tipo de cremas pero no estaban disponibles en mexico (cuando no había amazon mexico) Hace dos meses me animé a comprarla y estoy tan agradecida y sorprendida! No me importa que tenga un pequeño olor siempre y cuando funcione! Y así fue, mi piel se siente liza, la gente que me conoce se ha sorprendido por el cambio. LA VOLVERÉ A COMPRAR! Incluso en el resto del cuerpo donde no tengo el problema de granitos mi piel se siente súper suave! En serio LA AMO <3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Doing what it says it does, I’m loving it. Thanks amazon
